    • Method Detail

      • getStory

        public Story getStory(java.lang.String id)
        Grabs a story with the given id from the local database
        Parameters:
        id - The GUID of the story
        Returns:
        The Story object or null if the id doesn't exist in the database

      • getStories

        public java.util.ArrayList<Story> getStories()
        Retrieves all stories located on local storage
        Returns:
        Collection of all stories on local storage. Collection is empty if there are no stories

      • getStoriesAuthoredBy

        public java.util.ArrayList<Story> getStoriesAuthoredBy(java.lang.String author)
        Retrieves all stories located on local storage by an author
        Returns:
        Collection of all stories on local storage by an author. Collection is empty if there are no stories by author.

      • getStoryFragment

        public StoryFragment getStoryFragment(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieves story fragments by specific ID from local storage
        Parameters:
        id - The GUID of the fragment
        Returns:
        StoryFragment instance or null

      • getStoryFragments

        public java.util.ArrayList<StoryFragment> getStoryFragments(java.lang.String storyid)
        Retrieves all StoryFragments for a particular Story's _ID
        Parameters:
        storyid - The _ID for a story
        Returns:
        A Collection of StoryFragments. Empty if none exist.

      • getBookmark

        public Bookmark getBookmark(java.lang.String storyid)
        Gets the Bookmark from the story ID
        Parameters:
        storyid - The _ID of the story
        Returns:
        The Bookmark object

      • getAllBookmarks

        public java.util.ArrayList<Bookmark> getAllBookmarks()
        Gets all Bookmarks in the database
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all bookmarks

      • setBookmark

        public boolean setBookmark(Bookmark bookmark)
        Inserts or updates a bookmark into the Database
        Parameters:
        bookmark - The updated bookmark to be inserted
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not.

      • setStory

        public boolean setStory(Story story)
        Inserts or Updates a Story in the Database
        Parameters:
        story - The story to push into the Database
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not

      • setStoryFragment

        public boolean setStoryFragment(StoryFragment frag)
        Inserts or pushes a story fragment to the database
        Parameters:
        frag - The fragment to insert or update
        Returns:
        True if successful, false if not
